programme.title: Banged Up Abroad
programme.desc: After an injury, Greg Williams' happy life falls apart. He decides to volunteer as a missionary in the Philippines, but finds danger instead when he is kidnapped by a violent local group. A mother and son also head to the Philippines to visit family, but find themselves kidnapped by the same group. When their ransom is paid but only the mother is released, her 14-year-old son must wait in captivity for an opportunity to escape.

programme.title: Alaska: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The next generation of Alaskans play by their own rules, rebelling against society norms and surviving Arctic climates. Michael Manzo travels nomadically in search of opportunity. Alex Javor leaves life in Virginia behind to build his dream cabin. The Rowlands instill critical lessons of survival to their children. And Brent and Ida work 24/7 on their business while navigating life as a new couple.

programme.title: Lawless Island
programme.desc: Lawless Island is a series focusing on a group of people who have chosen a new life far away in Alaska. United by their extreme independence and love of the wild, the show's characters have left civilized way of life behind. Now they have to deal with many different things common people do not encounter in there every day routine, like hunting and stocking the freezers, fishing, farming in order to survive. It makes them realize how dependable they are on each other.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim Shaw, a car enthusiast and TV presenter teams up with master mechanic Fuzz Townshend to rescue rusty old cars and classic vehicles from their former neglected lives. People can nominate a relative or friend without them knowing if they've been unable to restore the car themselves for any reason from medical issues to financial problems. A team of experts work hard to restore the vehicles to their former glory and once they have been revamped the owner is surprised with a reunion, usually at a staged event organised by Tim Shaw.

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: In this action-packed adventure comedy series we follow children of the Hunter family-Tess, Anika, Sal, Daniel and Max, the newest member of the family as they search for their missing foster parents through all Amsterdam. At the same time they must run from the people that mean them harm and solve the family mystery to uncover the special treasure and get their parents back and in the process they learn a lot about love and family.

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: In this action-packed adventure comedy series we follow children of the Hunter family-Tess, Anika, Sal, Daniel and Max, the newest member of the family as they search for their missing foster parents through all Amsterdam. At the same time they must run from the people that mean them harm and solve the family mystery to uncover the special treasure and get their parents back and in the process they learn a lot about love and family.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: School of Rock is an American musical-comedy television series based on the 2003 film of the same name. A group of teenagers of the prestigious american school have a pretty predictable life, until one day totally changes everything. Once they get a substitute teacher Dewey Finn and he instructs Tomika, Freddy, Summer, Zack and Lawrence in the art of rock and roll. Mr Finn has his own view on the lesson structure and he gets across to the students easily so they become his huge fans at once. Thanks to Mr Finn the teens create a rock band and learn to play different instruments. Rock helps them to realize that in order to become successful they must learn how to work as a team, merge into one and leave any signs of egoistic behavior behind.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Game Shakers revolves around two seventh graders, Babe and Kenzie, who live and go to school in Brooklyn, New York. Once they create a video game called "Sky Whale" as part of their school science project. The two friends have no idea that their game will become very popular and make a fortune. Everything goes smoothly until famous rapper Double G wants to sue them for illegal use of his song in the game. The girls decide to make an offer he can't refuse- business partnership, they also offer his son Triple G to become a video game consultant.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea spong Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest adventures.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells about the ten year old boy Timmy that lives in the fictional town Dimmsdale where he has a hard time. His life is constantly miserable because his parents are rarely home, he is babysat by Vicky, a 16-year-old torturous babysitter, he is bullied daily, and is tormented by his teacher, Mr. Crocker. But everything changes when he receives two fairy godparents: Cosmo, his wife Wanda, and later their son, Poof. Timmy learns that his fairy godparents are capable of granting him any wish he wants within certain limits. However, Timmy's immature nature causes him to sometimes ask for wishes that unintentionally result in disaster.

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: 44 Cats is an Italian preschool animated television series about four kittens who create a musical group called the Buffycats. Lampo is the lead singer and guitarist, Milady is the bassist, Pilou is the drummer and Meatball is the keyboard player. The kittens live in the house of Granny Pina where they meet 40 other cats. Granny likes to cook her magic pasta that gives the Buffycats their special powers. Her old garage is turned into a club, where the kittens give concerts and polish up their musical talents. They are always enthusiastic and optimistic, ready to give a helping hand to other cats and kittens. The 44 Cats is inspired by a very popular Italian kids song, 44 Cats which became famous on children's song festival Zecchino d'Oro in 1968.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You
programme.desc: We are reading Blue's Clues to figure out what book Blue wants to read for story time. While looking for clues we practice letter recognition and sound, help Mr. Salt & Mrs. Pepper with their grocery list and skidoo into a book!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You
programme.desc: Count along with Josh & Blue in this game of Blue's Clues to find out what Blue wants to buy at the store. We help Shovel & Pail learn who has more graham crackers then help Josh discover what he can buy with his Blue dollars.

programme.title: Deer Squad
programme.desc: After Kai saves some baby turtles, they form a fan club. Full of himself, Kai tries to save the Central Forest from over-heating without his teammates. Rammy wants to win the city marathon but he cannot keep up with Sir Steel's super sneakers!

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger's tour bus goes out of control when he tries to bring tourists to Foggy Bottom! PAW Patrol to the rescue! A fun museum sleepover is interrupted when Alex and the mini-patrol go missing, and Mayor Goodway gets stranded on a T-Rex!

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Follow Ryder and his team of trusty side-pups as they try their best to help keep Adventure Bay safe from mayhem and mischief. Alongside his service pups Marshall, Rubble, Chase, Zuma, Rocky and Skye, ten-year-old Ryder proudly leads the Paw Patrol team as they confront their rivals over in the neighbouring town of Foggy Bottom. Under the watch of an arrogant Mayor Humdinger, Foggy Bottom's local crew of pesky kitties love nothing more than eating candy and stirring up a little trouble for Ryder and his friends. Lucky for the citizens of Adventure Bay, "no job is too big and no pup is too small" for the team to handle, and whether navigating sea, land or sky, these mighty pups are ready to go, go, go!

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: 44 Cats is an Italian preschool animated television series about four kittens who create a musical group called the Buffycats. programme.title: Alvinnn!!! And The Chipmunks
programme.desc: The series is an animated comedy about a single father named David Seville, who is raising three chipmunks. He can lose his patience sometimes, causing him to say ALVINNN!!! . The series takes place in modern times and discusses modern topics such as Dave's technology issues and school bullying. Others are parents embarrassing kids and parents needing dates.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: The older sisters reluctantly let Lynn into their babysitting club but she quickly proves to be too aggressive. Ronnie Anne wants to go downtown. But her grandparents think it's too dangerous, so they decide to spy on her.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This children's cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincoln's best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincoln's abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincoln's oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: After witnessing an excess of lying in the family, Lisa invents lie-detecting glasses to try and curb the fibs. Lincoln asks to borrow Clyde's new gaming system, but Clyde struggles to trust that it's safe with him.

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures
programme.desc: Lego City Adventures is an American-Danish computer-animated TV series produced by The Lego Group. The series is set in the noisy sprawling LEGO City metropolis, where its down-to-earth characters live and work. Here you will meet the bravest firemen, the best policemen, the most attentive mayor and LEGO characters from all walks of life. They team up to stop a mysterious criminal, who causes troubles all around. Each LEGO City citizen can feel quite a hero and participate in the most amazing and unbelievable adventures in the city! If you find yourself there, you witness everyday incidents with a happy ending.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea spong Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Ever wonder what it's like to grow up in a big family? Eleven-year-old Lincoln Loud gives viewers an inside look at how to survive the chaos of a huge household, especially as the only boy with ten sisters!

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Tired of doing favors to get a ride from Lori, Lincoln decides it's time to help Leni pass her driver's test. Lincoln conspires with the rest of his sisters to overthrow Lori's tyranny as their "baby"sitter.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Entertaining comedy series that follows the out-of-this-world adventures of the Thundermans, a family that has superpowers but try to live normal lives in the town of Hiddenville. The parents, Hank and Barb, used to be "Thunder Man" and "Electress", until they decided to retire and move to suburbs, in an attempt to live a normal life with their kids- ''Thunder Twins'' Phoebe, whose superpowers include telekinesis, heat breath and freeze breath and Max, who has the same powers but wants to become a super-villain, Billy who is super fast, Nora, who has laser eyes and Chloe, whose superpower is teleportation.

programme.title: The Thundermans

programme.title: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky & Dawn
programme.desc: Everyone with siblings knows that sibling rivalry is a real thing, so imagine the sibling rivalry between quadruplets. That's everyday life for the Harper quadruplets Nicky, Ricky, Dicky and Dawn.Whilst you might assume they get on well, these four siblings have absolutely nothing in common which normally leads to family fights. Although everyday life can be tough they have to learn to work together to solve the endless problems that they find themselves facing. Produced by Nickelodeon this lighthearted American comedy series is sure to have you fits of giggles.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Henry Danger

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Nickelodeon the Substitute
programme.desc: Substitute teachers tend to get a lot of flack from boisterous pupils, but this time is the pupils who are getting pranked. In this reality series, celebrities go undercover as a substitute to fool the unsuspecting kids. Completely disguised by a team of expert make up artists, the celebrities venture into schools, camps, and similar locations to give these pupils the shock of their lives. Hidden cameras are in place to capture their hilarious reactions, as the celebrity substitutes employ bizarre behaviours that dumbfound the kids. Each organisation receives a $25,000 donation after the celebrity's true identity is revealed.

programme.title: Side Hustle
programme.desc: Side Hustle follows best friends, smart and sarcastic Lex and confident and tough Presley, as they devise a plan to make money when fireworks accidentally destroy a boat belonging to the dad of their quirky friend and neighbor, Munchy.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Entertaining comedy series that follows the out-of-this-world adventures of the Thundermans, a family that has superpowers but try to live normal lives in the town of Hiddenville. The parents, Hank and Barb, used to be "Thunder Man" and "Electress", until they decided to retire and move to suburbs, in an attempt to live a normal life with their kids- ''Thunder Twins'' Phoebe, whose superpowers include telekinesis, heat breath and freeze breath and Max, who has the same powers but wants to become a super-villain, Billy who is super fast, Nora, who has laser eyes and Chloe, whose superpower is teleportation.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Entertaining comedy series that follows the out-of-this-world adventures of the Thundermans, a family that has superpowers but try to live normal lives in the town of Hiddenville. The parents, Hank and Barb, used to be "Thunder Man" and "Electress", until they decided to retire and move to suburbs, in an attempt to live a normal life with their kids- ''Thunder Twins'' Phoebe, whose superpowers include telekinesis, heat breath and freeze breath and Max, who has the same powers but wants to become a super-villain, Billy who is super fast, Nora, who has laser eyes and Chloe, whose superpower is teleportation.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This children's cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincoln's best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincoln's abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincoln's oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest adventures.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest adventures.

programme.title: Mājā un sētā
programme.desc: 2.sezona, 22.epizode. Ar padomiem, pieredzes stāstiem gan lauciniekiem, gan pilsētniekiem, ikvienam, kuram ir interese par dārza darbiem un savas dzīves vides uzlabošanu. Šajā sezonā akcentēsim zaļo dzīvesveidu, kā dzīvot veselīgāk, saimniekot taupīgāk un videi draudzīgāk. Un tā kā vēl kādu laiku nāksies sadzīvot ar koronavīrusa klātbūtni, meklēsim interesantas, mazāk zināmas atpūtas vietas laukos. Un neizpaliks arī padomi, kā parūpēties par mūsu mīļdzīvniekiem.

programme.desc: 28.epizode. Ilona Balode-Ūdre. Mūziķa Rolanda Ūdra dzīve mainījās pēc traģiskās avārijas pirms četriem gadiem. Arī viņa sievai Ilonai, kuras jaunā grāmata "Ielu muzikanta piezīmes" atklāj notikumus abu kopīgajā ikdienā no pārgalvīgiem ceļojumiem agrāk un realitātei tagad. Kā likt atbildīgajām instancēm ķerties pie elementāri atrisināmu jautājumu sakārtošanas, kā iekļauties pasaulē, kurā citādību ne visi uztver kā normu, klausies sarunā ar rakstnieci, aktrisi, sievu un mammu Ilonu Balodi-Ūdri.

Ikdienišķa maltīte kļūs par svētkiem, ja to pārvērtīsiet kopīgā grilēšanas pasākumā dārzā, piemājas terasē vai pie dabas krūts.

programme.title: Брат за брата
programme.desc: Такие кварталы, как Гарлем, раньше можно было увидеть только в голливудских боевиках. Никто не думал, что они могут появиться и у нас. Гарлем – настоящее гетто в одном из крупных российских городов. Здесь почти открыто торгуют наркотиками и перепродают краденое. Школьные учителя боятся своих учеников, ведь те способны убить за плохую оценку. Местные стражи правопорядка не рискуют в позднее время суток лишний раз появляться на его улицах, а жители так привыкли к установленным правилам игры, что кажется, ничто и никогда не сможет заставить их иначе смотреть на происходящее вокруг.

programme.title: Улетное видео по-русски
programme.desc: Улетное видео по-русски – это сборник самых смешных и невероятных видео со всей планеты. В каждом выпуске представлены смешные падения людей, а также глупые поступки и нелепые ситуации в которые они попадают. Все серии улетного видео также не обошлись без обаятельных и неповторимых животных. Лучшее видео с любимыми котиками, смешным собаками и сотнями представителей дикой и домашней фауны, также собраны в одной передаче. Если смотреть улетное видео по-русски, то можно смело забыть о плохом настроении, ведь герои передачи заставят рассмеяться даже самого грустного зрителя. Все серии шоу пропитаны искрометным юмором, смешными шутками и невероятными кадрами. Помимо этого в шоу собраны редкие записи природных катаклизмов, сумасшедших везений и еще много-много все.

programme.title: Документальный проект
programme.desc: Свет одновременно материален и нематериален. Вечность – главная особенность света. Фотонам не свойственно стареть. Свет от далеких звезд идет до Земли миллионы лет и приходит неизменным. Человек видит окружающие предметы исключительно благодаря фотонам. Проведенные исследования породили еще одну версию возникновение мира, согласно которой мир создан из света и может быть вновь обращен в свет. Об этом и многом другом расскажет Документальный проект.

programme.title: Шефы
programme.desc: Мини-сериал рассказывает о шеф-поваре знаменитого французского заведения, готовом пойти на всё ради спасения собственного ресторана. А также, о его отношениях с другими людьми, в полностью неполиткорректном мире…

programme.title: Euronews
programme.desc: Свежие репортажи из разных уголков Европы помогут зрителям Первого канала ориентироваться в водовороте бурной европейской жизни

programme.title: Улетное видео по-русски
programme.desc: Улетное видео по-русски – это сборник самых смешных и невероятных видео со всей планеты. В каждом выпуске представлены смешные падения людей, а также глупые поступки и нелепые ситуации в которые они попадают. Все серии улетного видео также не обошлись без обаятельных и неповторимых животных. Лучшее видео с любимыми котиками, смешным собаками и сотнями представителей дикой и домашней фауны, также собраны в одной передаче. Все серии шоу пропитаны искрометным юмором, смешными шутками и невероятными кадрами. Помимо этого в шоу собраны редкие записи природных катаклизмов, сумасшедших везений и еще много-много все.

programme.title: Документальный проект
programme.desc: Свет одновременно материален и нематериален. Вечность – главная особенность света. Фотонам не свойственно стареть. Свет от далеких звезд идет до Земли миллионы лет и приходит неизменным. Человек видит окружающие предметы исключительно благодаря фотонам. Проведенные исследования породили еще одну версию возникновение мира, согласно которой мир создан из света и может быть вновь обращен в свет. Об этом и многом другом расскажет Документальный проект.

programme.title: Когда мы дома
programme.desc: Об эволюции семейных отношений – от начала совместной жизни и до старости. Главные герои – пять украинских семейных пар разного возраста и степени развития отношений, которые не знакомы между собой. События в комедийном сериале разворачиваются в стенах квартир, в которых проживают пары, и построены на коротких историях из семейной жизни.

programme.title: Реальная мистика
programme.desc: Огромному количеству людей приходилось сталкиваться с проявлением необъяснимого и сверхъестественного, однако в большинстве случаев найти рациональный ответ на произошедшую ситуацию не удавалось никому. Докудрама "Реальная мистика" ставит перед собой амбициозную задачу: разгадать, на первый взгляд, абсолютно загадочные и мистические явления. Герои "Реальной мистики" – простые зрители, столкнувшиеся с необъяснимым в своей жизни. Ведущий документального реалити актер Андрей Дебрин вместе с командой помощников будет проводить расследование самых запутанных историй, которые происходят в мире: НЛО, гадания, привороты, аномальные зоны и многим другим и выяснят, что на самом деле за ними стоит.

programme.title: Курортный роман
programme.desc: Это документальный сериал с элементами реалити об обычных людях, с которыми во время отдыха произошло интересное знакомство, полностью изменившее их жизнь. Курортные романы, неожиданные встречи со старыми знакомыми, супружеские измены, подставы и поиски настоящей, истинной любви на морском берегу под лучами обжигающего солнца! Стоит ли заводить курортные романы, или лучше от них воздержаться?

programme.title: След
programme.desc: Действие сериала разворачивается в Москве вокруг новой экспериментальной лаборатории. Она оснащена по последнему слову техники, но есть всего шесть человек способных работать с новейшими технологическими разработками. Сотрудники лаборатории — это персонал Федеральной Экспертной Службы. ФЭС – это суперкоманда нашего времени, лучшие кадры всех областей криминалистики. Исследуя различные улики, генерируя версии, изобличая преступников, они помогают следствию в раскрытии реальных уголовных преступлений. Первостепенная задача ФЭС – найти то, что не смогут другие, их интерес – материальный мир места преступления. Миллиметр за миллиметром они исследуют каждую улику, ничто не останется незамеченным.

programme.title: След
programme.desc: Действие сериала разворачивается в Москве вокруг новой экспериментальной лаборатории. Она оснащена по последнему слову техники, но есть всего шесть человек способных работать с новейшими технологическими разработками. programme.title: На троих
programme.desc: Персонажами шоу становятся обычные врачи и больные, ГАИшники и нарушители, родители и дети, полицейские и хулиганы, пилоты и стюардессы, офисные работники и даже стриптизёрши.

programme.title: Морские дьяволы. Смерч
programme.desc: Их называют "морскими дьяволами", хотя по праву их можно считать рыцарями трех стихий: они действуют на земле, в воде и в воздухе. Захватывающий боевик "Морские дьяволы" посвящен спецназовцам ВМФ России, всем боевым пловцам — тем, кто является элитой наших вооруженных сил. Все имена и боевые псевдонимы в сериале вымышлены, отряд под таким названием никогда не существовал, но такие подразделения существуют на самом деле, и их подвигами страна вправе гордиться!

programme.title: Морские дьяволы. Смерч
programme.desc: Их называют "морскими дьяволами", хотя по праву их можно считать рыцарями трех стихий: они действуют на земле, в воде и в воздухе. Захватывающий боевик "Морские дьяволы" посвящен спецназовцам ВМФ России, всем боевым пловцам — тем, кто является элитой наших вооруженных сил. Все имена и боевые псевдонимы в сериале вымышлены, отряд под таким названием никогда не существовал, но такие подразделения существуют на самом деле, и их подвигами страна вправе гордиться!

programme.title: Детективы
programme.desc: Два полицейских в отставке открывают частное детективное агентство... Майоры полиции Игорь Лукин и Алексей Насонов вышли в отставку, но не собираются сидеть без дела. Они открывают частное детективное агентство "Детективы" и берутся за дела тех, кто по разным причинам не хочет обращаться в полицию… Опыт и профессиональные навыки Лукина и Насонова позволяют им с одинаковым успехом и решать семейные конфликты, и раскрывать уголовные преступления.

programme.title: Береговая охрана
programme.desc: рассказывает о жизни пограничного российского городка и непростой службе офицеров Береговой охраны ФСБ РФ. Андрей Васильков по распределению прибывает в Ушаков. Позади – пять лет в военно-морском институте, впереди – служба в береговой охране. Но вместо ожидаемых Васильковым романтики, приключений, опасностей и пороха, он получил каждодневную рутину. А еще – излишнюю самоуверенность, разгильдяйство, предательства, разочарования, настоящую мужскую дружбу, любовь к женщине, подвиги, героизм, взросление… И, как выяснилось, любовь к Родине. Потому что "есть такая профессия – Родину защищать".

programme.title: След
programme.desc: Действие сериала разворачивается в Москве вокруг новой экспериментальной лаборатории. Она оснащена по последнему слову техники, но есть всего шесть человек способных работать с новейшими технологическими разработками. Сотрудники лаборатории — это персонал Федеральной Экспертной Службы. ФЭС – это суперкоманда нашего времени, лучшие кадры всех областей криминалистики. Исследуя различные улики, генерируя версии, изобличая преступников, они помогают следствию в раскрытии реальных уголовных преступлений. Первостепенная задача ФЭС – найти то, что не смогут другие, их интерес – материальный мир места преступления. Миллиметр за миллиметром они исследуют каждую улику, ничто не останется незамеченным.

programme.title: След
programme.desc: Действие сериала разворачивается в Москве вокруг новой экспериментальной лаборатории. programme.title: Реальная мистика
programme.desc: Огромному количеству людей приходилось сталкиваться с проявлением необъяснимого и сверхъестественного, однако в большинстве случаев найти рациональный ответ на произошедшую ситуацию не удавалось никому. Докудрама "Реальная мистика" ставит перед собой амбициозную задачу: разгадать, на первый взгляд, абсолютно загадочные и мистические явления. Герои "Реальной мистики" – простые зрители, столкнувшиеся с необъяснимым в своей жизни. Ведущий документального реалити актер Андрей Дебрин вместе с командой помощников будет проводить расследование самых запутанных историй, которые происходят в мире: НЛО, гадания, привороты, аномальные зоны и многим другим и выяснят, что на самом деле за ними стоит.

programme.title: Preses klubs
programme.desc: Diskusiju raidījums, kurā raidījuma vadītājs ar trim viesiem apspriež konkrētās dienas aktualitātes.

programme.title: Detention Adventure
programme.desc: With a similar premise to The Goonies and The Breakfast Club, Detention Adventure follows three nerdy friends and the school bully, who repeatedly get themselves thrown in detention. However, they have good reason to do this as they are trying to find the entrance to a secret maze of tunnels filled with hidden traps that protect the legendary laboratory of Alexander Graham Bell. Raign (Simone Miller), Joy (Alina Prijono), and Hulk (Jack Fulton) are the three whip-smart geeks who discover an old textbook which points them to Bell's lab, conveniently hidden beneath their school. The school bully, Brett (Tomaso Sanelli) a detention regular, soons joins them as they use all of their attributes to try to navigate through the labyrinth and find hidden passageways to lead them to their goal.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animals
programme.desc: Incredible nature documentary series in which Andy Day, a famous English presenter, shows children a variety of baby animals from different locations around the world. Andy will tell you some interesting stories and you will have a chance to discover some surprising facts. Each episode is themed around a different behaviour that baby animals have to learn in order to survive, such as walking, climbing, jumping, swimming, eating, making friends, and many more important skills.

programme.title: History Hunters
programme.desc: History Hunters documentary series let young viewers explore past civilizations and cultures, their heritage and its influence on future generations. It is a fun way for both parents and kids to learn history and discover its mysterious facts and events. Various chapters of history are there for you: from exploration of Vikings, including their myths, alphabet and foods, to the Mayan civilization, the culture of Europe's wide-ranging clans of Celts and life in the islands in the Pacific Ocean known collectively as Polynesia, and much more.

programme.title: Science Max: Experiments at Large
programme.desc: Science Max: Experiments at Large is a Canadian children's TV series, hosted by Phil McCordic. The aim is to educate viewers about science through various experiments and to demonstrate main scientific principles in a fun and entertaining way. There is an interactive online component in the show, kids are welcome to interact with the host and ask him science questions. Kids will find out how gravity works, what polymers are, why boomerangs come back and much more. When it comes to scientific experiments, everything is large, as Phil likes to go bigger to make it more entertaining for the viewers.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Re-telling history in a way you never have before, Horrible History shows the dark and gruesome aspects of British and other Western world history. Ranging from the Stone Age to post-World War II era, the show presents the history with several time periods in a single episode, with live action sketches and music videos intercut by animations and quizzes. Starring Matthew Baynton, Simon Farnaby, Martha Howe-Douglas, Jim Howick, Laurence Rickard, Sarah Hadland and Ben Willbond with a large supporting cast, this British children's live-action historical and musical sketch comedy is based on the bestselling books of the same name by Terry Deary, adapted for CBBC. Running from 2009 to 2013, Horrible Histories doesn't set out to educate younger audiences but instead popularise history and inspire curiosity for further investigation into history.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures
programme.desc: In one of the biggest safari parks in the whole world there is Ranger Andy, who will go off in his truest mobile- buggy to fix the problem. He is not alone with help from his Boss, Mr Hammond and Tech superstar Jen who know everything about computer. They are here to help all of the animal from the small and cute to the big and scary that you wouldn't normally get too close to. Everyday there is a new problem that need solving by Andy all around the whole world. Come a long on this epic journey of Adventure and learning about your favourite animal along the way.

programme.title: MathXplosion
programme.desc: Mathemagician' Eric Leclerc shares secrets from the not-so-hidden world of math in this exciting, entertaining math-short series, proving math really is everywhere! In each episode, Eric illuminates the big ideas in primary math that children are already learning to do. From computation, to patterns in a number sequence, to shapes and space, and measurement, mathXplosion highlights how math is related and connected to things they see, know, and wonder about in their daily lives. mathXplosion aims to grow and foster a love of math in a fun, funny, and approachable way!

programme.title: Xploration DIY Sci
programme.desc: Steve Spangler is an American television personality, author, science teacher and the host of Xploration DIY SCI show. Each episode is about a certain science concept strengthened by science experiments, so that theory and practice are integrated. Steve conducts his fun experiments using everyday items everybody can get, so anyone can be a scientist. Watch, have fun and learn about the power of pressure, power of gas, laws of inertia, how to make elephant toothpaste at home and much more.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off
programme.desc: This is a version of the Great British Bake Off, except in this series, the contestants are all aged between nine and fifteen years. They will compete over 15 episodes, trying to make the best bread, biscuits, and cake, all manner of baked goods, in fact. At the end of the 15 weeks, one of the twenty original contestants will be crowned the winner. But who has got what it takes? Comedian Harry Hill presents, with Liam Charles and Prue Leith as the judges. Each week, there will be a technical test, followed by a "Showstopper" round, in which contestants are encouraged to get creative and create more individual bakes, with little guidelines. In the technical, however, they have to follow a recipe and produce bakes in a more uniform manner.

programme.title: Deadly Pole to Pole
programme.desc: Deadly Pole to Pole is a documentary series hosted by Steve Backshall, who travels pole to pole through the Americas while looking for the most dangerous animals. Join Steve and his deadliest adventure- 14-month voyage from the Arctic to the Antarctic via Alaska, California, Hawaii, Mexico and Brazil and many more amazing locations. Have a look at his meetings with white whales, ice bears, sharks, eagles, wolves, sea lions, eagles, crocodiles, snakes and spiders.

programme.title: Gym Stars
programme.desc: Watch some of Britain's youngest gym stars at the top of their game. See loses and wins, injuries and successes and a team with some of the best strength and agility to represent their country worldwide. Go with the elite team to seem them aganist some of the best gymnasts in Europe in intense competitions using the pole vault and even trampolining. And look into the life of a gymnast behind the scenes and away from their professonal sport. The show will take you to visit the homes the gymnasts live in, the routines they do each day and their personal life away from their professional.

programme.title: It's My Party
programme.desc: From Diwali, the Hindu festival of lights to Hanukkah to Kwanzaa to Mexico's Day of the Dead, viewers are taken on a fascinating journey of discovery into different cultural celebrations seen from a kid's perspective. Each episode pairs up two kids who have never met; one acts as the party host introducing the other, their VIP guest, to their family's cultural celebration. The two newfound friends jump in feet first, exploring the origins and meaning behind the traditions, participating in a series of challenges and games linked to the food, fashion and festivities of the dynamic celebrations, which culminate in a lively performance by both kids.

programme.title: Baby Animals
programme.desc: Arctic foxes, sea otters, tamarin monkeys and red pandas are just some of the tiniest, cutest creatures featured in Baby Animals. With their big eyes and wobbly first steps, nature's newbies are irresistible. Watch how animals nurture their young as infant elephants, baby bison and rambunctious rhinos all eat, sleep and play their way to adulthood. Cuddly, clumsy and full of mischief, the babies of the animal kingdom certainly make up the wildest daycare you've ever seen.

programme.title: Wild But True With Robert Irwin
programme.desc: Wild But True is a fun and exciting biomimicry series that explores how nature and wildlife have influenced our modern day lives. Robert Irwin, our Wildlife Warrior and nature lover, teams up with Isabel Yamazaki, our resident scientist, to reveal how science has made mankind a true student of Mother Nature. In each episode, Robert and Isabel explore nature's amazing solutions for problems in the wild and reveal how humans use these blueprints to make the world greener, safer, more efficient and more fun for future generations.

programme.title: Science Max: Experiments at Large
programme.desc: Science Max: Experiments at Large is a Canadian children's TV series, hosted by Phil McCordic. The aim is to educate viewers about science through various experiments and to demonstrate main scientific principles in a fun and entertaining way. There is an interactive online component in the show, kids are welcome to interact with the host and ask him science questions. Kids will find out how gravity works, what polymers are, why boomerangs come back and much more. When it comes to scientific experiments, everything is large, as Phil likes to go bigger to make it more entertaining for the viewers.

programme.title: Andy's Dinosaur Adventures
programme.desc: Andy Day is on a Jurassic mission to explore the lost world of the dinosaurs in this children's series. Using his unique, time-travelling clock, he ventures back to prehistoric times, when these gigantic animals ruled the forests, plains, oceans and skies. Helping him along the way is trusted friend Hatty, a dinosaur expert and palaeontologist, who prepares exhibits in the dinosaur section of the National Museum. Though caring and thoughtful, Andy's mishaps and accidents at the museum are often the reason for his time-travelling antics, as he must replace any broken items before Hatty's exhibits open.

programme.desc: With a similar premise to The Goonies and The Breakfast Club, Detention Adventure follows three nerdy friends and the school bully, who repeatedly get themselves thrown in detention. In each episode, Robert and Isabel explore nature's amazing solutions for problems in the wild and reveal how humans use these blueprints to make the world greener, safer, more efficient and more fun for future generations.

programme.title: History Hunters
programme.desc: History Hunters documentary series let young viewers explore past civilizations and cultures, their heritage and its influence on future generations. It is a fun way for both parents and kids to learn history and discover its mysterious facts and events. Various chapters of history are there for you: from exploration of Vikings, including their myths, alphabet and foods, to the Mayan civilization, the culture of Europe's wide-ranging clans of Celts and life in the islands in the Pacific Ocean known collectively as Polynesia, and much more.

programme.title: Baby Animals
programme.desc: Arctic foxes, sea otters, tamarin monkeys and red pandas are just some of the tiniest, cutest creatures featured in Baby Animals. With their big eyes and wobbly first steps, nature's newbies are irresistible. Watch how animals nurture their young as infant elephants, baby bison and rambunctious rhinos all eat, sleep and play their way to adulthood. Cuddly, clumsy and full of mischief, the babies of the animal kingdom certainly make up the wildest daycare you've ever seen.

programme.title: Hero Squad
programme.desc: Six children are transformed into Hero Squad cadets and undergo a rigorous training programme alongside real life-savers. Under the watchful eye of presenter Rav Wilding and closely supervised by experienced mentors, these six wannabe heroes have the experience of a lifetime. In just 48 hours, the Hero Squad cadets have to learn the skills and techniques to cope with a "real life" rescue scenario.

programme.title: Science Max: Experiments at Large
programme.desc: Science Max: Experiments at Large is a Canadian children's TV series, hosted by Phil McCordic. The aim is to educate viewers about science through various experiments and to demonstrate main scientific principles in a fun and entertaining way. There is an interactive online component in the show, kids are welcome to interact with the host and ask him science questions. Kids will find out how gravity works, what polymers are, why boomerangs come back and much more. When it comes to scientific experiments, everything is large, as Phil likes to go bigger to make it more entertaining for the viewers.

programme.title: Gym Stars
programme.desc: Watch some of Britain's youngest gym stars at the top of their game. See loses and wins, injuries and successes and a team with some of the best strength and agility to represent their country worldwide. Go with the elite team to seem them aganist some of the best gymnasts in Europe in intense competitions using the pole vault and even trampolining. And look into the life of a gymnast behind the scenes and away from their professonal sport. The show will take you to visit the homes the gymnasts live in, the routines they do each day and their personal life away from their professional.

programme.title: Andy's Dinosaur Adventures
programme.desc: Andy Day is on a Jurassic mission to explore the lost world of the dinosaurs in this children's series. Using his unique, time-travelling clock, he ventures back to prehistoric times, when these gigantic animals ruled the forests, plains, oceans and skies. Helping him along the way is trusted friend Hatty, a dinosaur expert and palaeontologist, who prepares exhibits in the dinosaur section of the National Museum. Though caring and thoughtful, Andy's mishaps and accidents at the museum are often the reason for his time-travelling antics, as he must replace any broken items before Hatty's exhibits open.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off
programme.desc: This is a version of the Great British Bake Off, except in this series, the contestants are all aged between nine and fifteen years. They will compete over 15 episodes, trying to make the best bread, biscuits, and cake, all manner of baked goods, in fact. At the end of the 15 weeks, one of the twenty original contestants will be crowned the winner. But who has got what it takes? Comedian Harry Hill presents, with Liam Charles and Prue Leith as the judges. Each week, there will be a technical test, followed by a "Showstopper" round, in which contestants are encouraged to get creative and create more individual bakes, with little guidelines. In the technical, however, they have to follow a recipe and produce bakes in a more uniform manner.

programme.title: Xploration DIY Sci
programme.desc: Steve Spangler is an American television personality, author, science teacher and the host of Xploration DIY SCI show. Each episode is about a certain science concept strengthened by science experiments, so that theory and practice are integrated. Steve conducts his fun experiments using everyday items everybody can get, so anyone can be a scientist. Watch, have fun and learn about the power of pressure, power of gas, laws of inertia, how to make elephant toothpaste at home and much more.

programme.title: Detention Adventure
programme.desc: With a similar premise to The Goonies and The Breakfast Club, Detention Adventure follows three nerdy friends and the school bully, who repeatedly get themselves thrown in detention. However, they have good reason to do this as they are trying to find the entrance to a secret maze of tunnels filled with hidden traps that protect the legendary laboratory of Alexander Graham Bell. Raign (Simone Miller), Joy (Alina Prijono), and Hulk (Jack Fulton) are the three whip-smart geeks who discover an old textbook which points them to Bell's lab, conveniently hidden beneath their school. The school bully, Brett (Tomaso Sanelli) a detention regular, soons joins them as they use all of their attributes to try to navigate through the labyrinth and find hidden passageways to lead them to their goal.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures
programme.desc: In one of the biggest safari parks in the whole world there is Ranger Andy, who will go off in his truest mobile- buggy to fix the problem. He is not alone with help from his Boss, Mr Hammond and Tech superstar Jen who know everything about computer. They are here to help all of the animal from the small and cute to the big and scary that you wouldn't normally get too close to. Everyday there is a new problem that need solving by Andy all around the whole world. Come a long on this epic journey of Adventure and learning about your favourite animal along the way.

programme.title: Deadly Pole to Pole
programme.desc: Deadly Pole to Pole is a documentary series hosted by Steve Backshall, who travels pole to pole through the Americas while looking for the most dangerous animals. Join Steve and his deadliest adventure- 14-month voyage from the Arctic to the Antarctic via Alaska, California, Hawaii, Mexico and Brazil and many more amazing locations. Have a look at his meetings with white whales, ice bears, sharks, eagles, wolves, sea lions, eagles, crocodiles, snakes and spiders.

programme.title: History Hunters
programme.desc: History Hunters documentary series let young viewers explore past civilizations and cultures, their heritage and its influence on future generations. It is a fun way for both parents and kids to learn history and discover its mysterious facts and events. Various chapters of history are there for you: from exploration of Vikings, including their myths, alphabet and foods, to the Mayan civilization, the culture of Europe's wide-ranging clans of Celts and life in the islands in the Pacific Ocean known collectively as Polynesia, and much more.

programme.title: MathXplosion
programme.desc: Mathemagician' Eric Leclerc shares secrets from the not-so-hidden world of math in this exciting, entertaining math-short series, proving math really is everywhere! In each episode, Eric illuminates the big ideas in primary math that children are already learning to do. From computation, to patterns in a number sequence, to shapes and space, and measurement, mathXplosion highlights how math is related and connected to things they see, know, and wonder about in their daily lives. mathXplosion aims to grow and foster a love of math in a fun, funny, and approachable way!

programme.title: Wild But True With Robert Irwin
programme.desc: Wild But True is a fun and exciting biomimicry series that explores how nature and wildlife have influenced our modern day lives. Robert Irwin, our Wildlife Warrior and nature lover, teams up with Isabel Yamazaki, our resident scientist, to reveal how science has made mankind a true student of Mother Nature. In each episode, Robert and Isabel explore nature's amazing solutions for problems in the wild and reveal how humans use these blueprints to make the world greener, safer, more efficient and more fun for future generations.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animals
programme.desc: Incredible nature documentary series in which Andy Day, a famous English presenter, shows children a variety of baby animals from different locations around the world. Andy will tell you some interesting stories and you will have a chance to discover some surprising facts. Each episode is themed around a different behaviour that baby animals have to learn in order to survive, such as walking, climbing, jumping, swimming, eating, making friends, and many more important skills.

programme.title: Gym Stars
programme.desc: Watch some of Britain's youngest gym stars at the top of their game. See loses and wins, injuries and successes and a team with some of the best strength and agility to represent their country worldwide. Go with the elite team to seem them aganist some of the best gymnasts in Europe in intense competitions using the pole vault and even trampolining. And look into the life of a gymnast behind the scenes and away from their professonal sport. The show will take you to visit the homes the gymnasts live in, the routines they do each day and their personal life away from their professional.

programme.title: It's My Party
programme.desc: From Diwali, the Hindu festival of lights to Hanukkah to Kwanzaa to Mexico's Day of the Dead, viewers are taken on a fascinating journey of discovery into different cultural celebrations seen from a kid's perspective. Each episode pairs up two kids who have never met; one acts as the party host introducing the other, their VIP guest, to their family's cultural celebration. The two newfound friends jump in feet first, exploring the origins and meaning behind the traditions, participating in a series of challenges and games linked to the food, fashion and festivities of the dynamic celebrations, which culminate in a lively performance by both kids.

programme.title: Andy's Dinosaur Adventures
programme.desc: Andy Day is on a Jurassic mission to explore the lost world of the dinosaurs in this children's series. Using his unique, time-travelling clock, he ventures back to prehistoric times, when these gigantic animals ruled the forests, plains, oceans and skies. Helping him along the way is trusted friend Hatty, a dinosaur expert and palaeontologist, who prepares exhibits in the dinosaur section of the National Museum. Though caring and thoughtful, Andy's mishaps and accidents at the museum are often the reason for his time-travelling antics, as he must replace any broken items before Hatty's exhibits open.

programme.title: Baby Animals
programme.desc: Arctic foxes, sea otters, tamarin monkeys and red pandas are just some of the tiniest, cutest creatures featured in Baby Animals. With their big eyes and wobbly first steps, nature's newbies are irresistible. Watch how animals nurture their young as infant elephants, baby bison and rambunctious rhinos all eat, sleep and play their way to adulthood. Cuddly, clumsy and full of mischief, the babies of the animal kingdom certainly make up the wildest daycare you've ever seen.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Re-telling history in a way you never have before, Horrible History shows the dark and gruesome aspects of British and other Western world history. Ranging from the Stone Age to post-World War II era, the show presents the history with several time periods in a single episode, with live action sketches and music videos intercut by animations and quizzes. Starring Matthew Baynton, Simon Farnaby, Martha Howe-Douglas, Jim Howick, Laurence Rickard, Sarah Hadland and Ben Willbond with a large supporting cast, this British children's live-action historical and musical sketch comedy is based on the bestselling books of the same name by Terry Deary, adapted for CBBC. Running from 2009 to 2013, Horrible Histories doesn't set out to educate younger audiences but instead popularise history and inspire curiosity for further investigation into history.

programme.title: SmartMix
programme.desc: The smartest mix of the best music available through the night! Just turn it on!

Со дна вершины
programme.desc: Алексей Царёв – семнадцатилетний лидер школы и подающий большие надежды чемпион юношеской сборной по горным лыжам. У Алексея есть любимая девушка Лина и друг Костя, его соперник и в спорте, и в любви. Алексей – первый во всём. Он уверен в себе, не умеет и не желает проигрывать. Но всё меняется в один миг.

programme.title: Мужчины и цыплята
programme.desc: Габриэль и Элиас — братья, но очень разные. Первый — измученный профессор, написавший книгу о смысле жизни, а второй одержим женщинами, но никогда не пользуется у них популярностью, поэтому часто довольствуется собственной персоной. Однажды отец братьев умирает и оставляет видеокассету, из которой они узнают шокирующую правду — они не родные братья, у них разные матери, а настоящий их отец живет неподалеку. Габриэль с Элиасом отправляются на его поиски и вскоре встречают остальных братьев — Франца, Йозефа и Грегора, которые живут в поместье, а их отец всё время спит. Усадьба полна загадок, и братьям предстоит узнать весьма неприятную правду.

programme.title: Проселочные дороги
programme.desc: Харли Алтмайер с трудом воспитывает своих младших сестёр после ужасного происшествия: их отец застрелен, а мать находится в тюрьме, обвинённая в убийстве мужа. Харли заводит роман с Калли Мерсер, замужней матерью двоих детей, но его жизнь окончательно усложняется, когда он становится главным подозреваемым в убийстве.

programme.title: Бюро легенд
programme.desc: Агент французской разведки возвращается после успешного задания из Сирии, где он провел последние шесть лет, работая под прикрытием. Вопреки инструкциям и принятой процедуре он не возвращает себе настоящее имя и личность, а продолжает оставаться в роли.

programme.title: Идеальная пятница для преступления
programme.desc: П.МакКенна. Молодая пара решает ограбить банк без использования огнестрельного оружия, но с первого раза у них ничего не получается...

programme.title: Со дна вершины
programme.desc: Алексей Царёв – семнадцатилетний лидер школы и подающий большие надежды чемпион юношеской сборной по горным лыжам. У Алексея есть любимая девушка Лина и друг Костя, его соперник и в спорте, и в любви. Алексей – первый во всём. Он уверен в себе, не умеет и не желает проигрывать. Но всё меняется в один миг.

programme.title: Джекил и Хайд
programme.desc: Действие разворачивается в Лондоне 1930-х годов, где Роберт Джекил, внук Генри Джекила, воспитанный на Цейлоне приёмными родителями, пытается узнать правду о своей настоящей семье и понять причину своих странных "приступов". По пятам за Робертом следует "Ми-И", британская спецслужба, занимающаяся паранормальными явлениями, а также агенты некоего сообщества, называемого "Тенебри".

programme.title: Жмот
programme.desc: Франсуа Готье — виртуозный скрипач. Но за талант, как водится, надо платить. У музыканта серьезный недостаток: он невероятно скуп. Мания экономить превращает его в одержимого, а любой платеж ввергает в панический ужас. Но однажды его жизнь резко меняется.

programme.title: Парни Аль Капоне
programme.desc: Действие фильма происходит в 1927 году в Чикаго, в колыбели мафиозных структур Америки. Трое англичан, по стечению обстоятельств попавшие в этот город, всеми силами стараются приспособиться к шальной жизни среди гангстерских разборок и подпольных тотализаторов. Но оставаться в стороне получается недолго. Люди одного из самых влиятельных мафиози истории, Аль Капоне, приметили смышленых друзей, способных, к тому же, неплохо постоять за себя...

programme.title: Прекрасное чудовище
programme.desc: Изабелла — прекрасна, но только внешне. Когда она пропадает на горнолыжном курорте, ее спасает Джереми, скрывающийся от своего прошлого. Он становится первым, кто смог поставить Изабеллу на место. Девушка понимает, что она может быть большим чудовищем, чем готова признаться даже самой себе. Под влиянием Джереми она начинает меняться и влюбляется.

programme.title: Полицейская история
programme.desc: -Луи Трентиньян, Ренато Сальватори, Клодин Оже. Этот фильм рассказывает о реальной истории охоты за опасным преступником Эмилем Бюиссоном, бежавшим из тюрьмы в 1947 году. В течение трех лет Бюиссону удавалось неоднократно ускользать из рук преследовавшего его детектива Боринша, убивая одного за другим его информаторов. Когда Бюиссон был все-таки пойман, ему было предъявлено обвинение в совершении 30 убийств и более 100 ограблений...

programme.title: Джекил и Хайд
programme.desc: Действие разворачивается в Лондоне 1930-х годов, где Роберт Джекил, внук Генри Джекила, воспитанный на Цейлоне приёмными родителями, пытается узнать правду о своей настоящей семье и понять причину своих странных "приступов". Под влиянием Джереми она начинает меняться и влюбляется.

programme.title: Stabilizators
programme.desc: Bijušais desantnieks Roberts Makkols sāk jaunu un klusu dzīvi, tomēr, redzot, kā tiek nolaupīta meitene, ir spiests ņemt rokās ieročus un stāties pretī mafijai.

programme.title: Laiks nogalināt
programme.desc: Izvarotas meitenes tēvs pats kļūst par soģi un nogalina uzbrucējus. Viņam draud nāvessods, un aizstāvību uzņemas veiksmīgs jauns advokāts.

programme.title: Projekts "Zilā grāmata"
programme.desc: Astrofiziķis Dr. J Alens Haineks ir pieņemts darbā kādā slepenā programmā kopā ar kapteini Maiklu Kvinnu. Viņš pamazām saprot, ka atrodas bīstama aizsega centrā.

programme.title: Naktstauriņa pareģojumi
programme.desc: Divus gadus pēc sievas traģiskās bojāejas žurnālists nonāk mazā Amerikas pilsētiņā, kur notiek neizskaidrojamas lietas. 2001. g.
